Issue.summary: Blocks not passed correctly from gossip layer to MSP layer
Issue.description: WARN 0cc Received fabricated block from 63 59 141 175 35 93 196 235 73 110 50 138 97 20 187 49 1 85 185 50 14 201 201 248 23 221 205 174 224 120 125 238 in DataUpdate: Failed casting SignedBlock to byte on channel foo Because the object that was passed wasn't a byte as expected but the object that contains the byte as a field. >
